title: Watch Face Rainbow Stars
summary: Animated Pixel Art style Watch Face for Android Wear with rainbows and stars
description: Take a ride on a rainbow to the stars - in Pixel Art style.Watch Face Rainbow Stars is a cool looking Pixel Art style watch face for your Wearable device. The clock is designed to run on different round and square devices (LG G Watch, Moto360, etc.)Features:* Android Wear Watch Face* Pixel Art style design* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)Installation:Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it. descriptionHTML:
Take a ride on a rainbow to the stars - in Pixel Art style.

Watch Face Rainbow Stars is a cool looking Pixel Art style watch face for your Wearable device. The clock is designed to run on different round and square devices (LG G Watch, Moto360, etc.)

Features:
* Android Wear Watch Face
* Pixel Art style design
* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)

Installation:
Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it. After installing the watchface, please give it a moment to synchronize with your watch.

Requirements:
*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher
*Android 5.0.1 or higher
